Usage: am am-run [OPTIONS] <SLOT> <CMD>...

Arguments:
  <SLOT>
  <CMD>...

Options:
  -p, --path <PATH>                [default: .]
  -a, --agent <AGENT>
      --ttl-seconds <TTL_SECONDS>  [default: 3600]
      --shared
      --exclusive
      --block-on-conflicts
      --no-block-on-conflicts
  -h, --help                       Print help
